post.title: News WoT January 2016
post.body:

**uCoin** network of universal basic income currencies :
MetaBrouzouf, a monetary community :

Web of Trust :

The graph represents all the members of the Web of Trust and all their (received) certifications in the MetaBrouzouf community.

post.title: News : game Ğeconomicus
post.body:
Ğeconomicus is a set of free graphics and tools to play a generic economy simulation based on 80 years human life expectancy or more, with different money systems, including a freedom money system like, as it is demonstrated in Relative Money Theory (GPL v3) = a money system based on an Universal Dividend (see https://github.com/vtexier/theorie-relative-de-la-monnaie).

Ğeconomicus 1.5 is out ! https://github.com/galuel/Geconomicus

![](https://ipfs.pics/ipfs/QmbpFtTvLA72uEiqgDBNWnkaNDZptzu8cATPPSPDhNtQ7G)

post.title: News : uCoin network
post.body:
![](https://ipfs.pics/ipfs/QmXz9hFjGxXErS1WL1SEvNv9GdYHjpsgn2PCfHJ8Rifi6V)

The number of contributors to Universal Dividend uCoin free money system is growing up again towards its 2015 higher level with higher speed. 
Contributors join the alpha-test basic income uCoin currency : the Meta-Brouzouf

http://www.ucoin.io

post.title: Press on uCoin
post.body:
**2016** :
* FR] 3 January : T.Crouzet blog : Et si blockchain révolutionnait la démocratie [link](http://tcrouzet.com/2016/01/03/et-si-blockchain-revolutionnait-la-democratie/)

**2015** :
* FR] 4 December : uCoin, Théorie relative de la monnaie et projets autour des monnaies libres [link](https://moul.re/blog/index.php?article3/ucoin)
